### Peering

```bash copy

```
```bash copy
3f472746f46493309650e5a033076689996c8881@lumera-testnet.rpc.kjnodes.com:16959
```
```bash copy
curl -Ls https://snapshots.kjnodes.com/lumera-testnet/addrbook.json > $HOME/.lumera/config/addrbook.json
```
